CommentBody: We performed a pre-flight NEA upgrade process by taking screenshots of all global settings and custom job configurations. We also performed a backup of all of your jobs and saved them to the D:.

Issue
Install new certificate and update StealthAudit to 11.6 or latest recommended. Purge data for old server FIPR01 decommissioned in 2023.
Cause
Request for proactive upgrade.

Resolution
Upgraded NEA platform, SDD application and AIC to the latest 11.6 version.

Verified that the AIC was accessible.
